name: Out of Time (itch) (KLewis)
description:
Out of Time is an old Year 2 University project developed by me and Steven Benson.

The project has been cancelled but the build has been released here. 

Players will go through 4 distinct levels all taking place in different time zones from Ancient Egpyt all the way to the future. Pick up different weapons and fight your way through enemies as you try and save time!

This game was made using Unity and is a 2D Platformer
